releaseNotes:
Introducing Our Exciting New Features!

Are you ready to experience the app like never before? We're thrilled to present our latest updates that will revolutionize the way you use our platform! 

Personalize Your Experience: Say hello to your brand-new home profile. Enjoy a seamless and personalized journey every time you use the app. 

Ad-Free & Premium Access: Tired of pesky ads interrupting your app usage? Say goodbye to distractions! With our exclusive subscription option, you'll unlock a world of premium functionalities and wave goodbye to annoying ads once and for all! Upgrade now and embrace the ultimate app experience.
 
Norway, Get Ready for Power-Packed Energy Insights! We're thrilled to announce our integration with Elhub, allowing you to track your energy usage like never before. Take full control of your energy consumption! For non-Norwegians: Will also come to a country near you.

Our innovation journey is just beginning, and we have an array of thrilling surprises in store for you! Brace yourself for new enhancements, exciting functionalities, and cutting-edge improvements. We can't wait to share all of this with you!

Get ready for a whole new world of possibilitiesâ€”download or update the app now! Happy app-ing!
description:
The app that gives you full control over everything to do with energy.

Get a simple overview of the expected energy price, as well as useful advice to reduce your electricity bill. Make smart energy choices and cut costs by comparing energy prices hour by hour. Get daily notification with the summary of tomorrows prices.

Here you get everything you need in one place:

Electricity price
- Get a full overview of the electricity price, hour by hour. You will get an overview of the energy prices today and tomorrow, as well as find historical electricity prices. Reduce your electricity bill by avoiding the most expensive hours of the day and using electricity when it is cheapest. The spot price varies from hour to hour and is governed by the electricity exchange Nord Pool.

Notifications
- Get notifications when you should avoid using a lot of energy. You can choose to receive a daily notification when the spot price is the cheapest and most expensive during the day.

Create your own locations
- Customize the app to your own locations - one or many, it's up to you!

Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/
